about_the_game:
Embark on an exhilarating adventure in Subject 95, a cutting-edge, immersive sci-fi puzzle game that transports players into a realm of thrilling challenges, high-tech weaponry, and interstellar exploration. Dive headfirst into a world where your wits and strategic thinking are your most powerful weapons, as you navigate through intricately designed levels teeming with tantalizing mysteries and mind-bending enigmas.

Set in a futuristic dystopian universe, you assume the role of Subject 95, an enigmatic test subject with a hidden past, struggling to regain lost memories and uncover the truth behind your existence. As you progress through the game, you'll unravel an intricate narrative that spans across a multitude of beautifully crafted environments, from the depths of shadowy research facilities to the far reaches of uncharted galaxies.

Subject 95 offers a dynamic gameplay experience that seamlessly combines classic puzzle-solving with action-packed combat, utilizing an arsenal of advanced weaponry and futuristic gadgets. Engage in adrenaline-fueled shootouts with hostile forces, pilot cutting-edge spaceships through treacherous asteroid fields, and employ high-tech tools to hack into encrypted systems and unlock the secrets of an enigmatic organization.

Each level of Subject 95 is meticulously designed to provide a deeply immersive and challenging experience. Overcome a wide variety of complex puzzles, ranging from intricate logic problems to physics-based conundrums, each requiring creative thinking and razor-sharp intuition. As you progress, you'll unlock new abilities and upgrades, allowing you to confront ever-increasing challenges and uncover the hidden depths of this enthralling narrative.

With its captivating storyline, stunning visuals, and engaging gameplay, Subject 95 offers players a truly unique and unforgettable journey. Whether you're a die-hard puzzle enthusiast or a seasoned sci-fi aficionado, you'll find yourself captivated by the rich and immersive world of Subject 95. Are you ready to unlock the secrets of your past and embrace your destiny? The future awaits.

name: Subject 95

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
